foreignData.name: Flächenbrand-Zerberus
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R}: Monstrum 1. (Falls diese Kreatur nicht monströs ist, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf sie und sie wird monströs.)
Wenn der Flächenbrand-Zerberus monströs wird, fügt er jedem Gegner und jeder Kreatur, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.name: Cerbero incendiario
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R}: Monstruosidad 1. (Si esta criatura no es monstruosa, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre ella y se convierte en monstruosa.)
Cuando el Cerbero incendiario se convierta en monstruoso, hace 2 puntos de daño a cada oponente y a cada criatura que controlan tus oponentes.

foreignData.name: Cerbère du feu dévastateur
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R} : Monstruosité 1. (Si cette créature n'est pas monstrueuse, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle et elle devient monstrueuse.)
Quand le Cerbère du feu dévastateur devient monstrueux, il inflige 2 blessures à chaque adversaire et à chaque créature que vos adversaires contrôlent.

foreignData.name: Cerbero dell'Incendio Indomabile
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R}: Mostruosità 1. (Se questa creatura non è mostruosa, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su di essa e diventa mostruosa.)
Quando il Cerbero dell'Incendio Indomabile diventa mostruoso, infligge 2 danni a ogni avversario e a ogni creatura controllata dai tuoi avversari.

foreignData.name: 燎原の火のケルベロス
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R}：怪物化１を行う。（このクリーチャーが怪物的でないなら、これの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。これは怪物的になる。）
燎原の火のケルベロスが怪物的になったとき、燎原の火のケルベロスは各対戦相手とあなたの対戦相手がコントロールする各クリーチャーに、それぞれ２点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 猟犬

foreignData.name: 들불 켈베로스
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R}: 괴수화 1. (이 생물이 괴수화하지 않았다면, 이 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다. 이 생물은 괴수화한다.)
들불 켈베로스가 괴수화할 때, 당신의 상대들과 그 상대들이 조종하는 생물들에게 각각 피해 2점을 입힌다.

foreignData.name: Cérbero Incendiário
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R}: Monstruosidade 1. (Se esta criatura não for monstruosa, coloque um marcador +1/+1 nela e ela se tornará monstruosa.)
Quando Cérbero Incendiário se torna monstruoso, ele causa 2 pontos de dano a cada oponente e a cada criatura controlada pelos seus oponentes.

foreignData.name: Цербер Пожара
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R}: Чудовищность 1. (Если это существо не является чудовищным, положите на него один жетон +1/+1, и оно становится чудовищным.)
Когда Цербер Пожара становится чудовищным, он наносит по 2 повреждения каждому оппоненту и каждому существу под контролем ваших оппонентов.

foreignData.name: 野火狱犬
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R}：蛮化1。（如果此生物未蛮化，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物且它蛮化。）
当野火狱犬蛮化时，它对每位对手及由对手操控的每个生物各造成2点伤害。

foreignData.name: 野火獄犬
foreignData.text:
{5}{R}{R}：蠻化1。（如果此生物未蠻化，則在其上放置一個+1/+1指示物且它蠻化。）
當野火獄犬蠻化時，它對每位對手及由對手操控的每個生物各造成2點傷害。

name: Wildfire Cerberus
originalText:
{5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Wildfire Cerberus becomes monstrous, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and each creature your opponents control.

rulings.text: Once a creature becomes monstrous, it can't become monstrous again. If the creature is already monstrous when the monstrosity ability resolves, nothing happens.
Monstrous isn't an ability that a creature has. It's just something true about that creature. If the creature stops being a creature or loses its abilities, it will continue to be monstrous.
An ability that triggers when a creature becomes monstrous won't trigger if that creature isn't on the battlefield when its monstrosity ability resolves.

text:
{5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Wildfire Cerberus becomes monstrous, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and each creature they control.
